DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy safety cinacalcet compare placebo patient stage 3 4 Chronic Kidney Disease ( CKD ) .
DOC.brief_title: Cinacalcet HCl Chronic Kidney Disease Subjects With Secondary Hyperparathyroidism Not Receiving Dialysis
DOC.criteria: Chronic Kidney Disease patient receive dialysis : An iPTH great 100 pg/mL [ 10.6 pmol/L ] subject stage 3 CKD great equal 160 pg/mL [ 17.0 pmol/L ] subject stage 4 CKD ; A serum calcium great 9.0 mg/dL [ 2.25 mmol/L ] ; An estimate GFR less equal 59 mL/min great equal 15 mL/min . Have unstable medical condition , define hospitalize within 30 day day 1 , otherwise unstable judgment investigator . Experienced myocardial infarction ( MI ) within 3 month day 1 . Likely initiate dialysis ( opinion investigator ) schedule undergo renal transplantation within 28 week day 1 . Received active vitamin D therapy ( i.e. , 1hydroxylated metabolite vitamin D ) less 30 day day 1 require change active vitamin D brand dose level within 30 day day 1 ( patient prescribe active vitamin D ) .
